mapper.sql: MENU_ID, MENU_PARENT_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_LEVELS, MENU_TYPE, MENU_PATH, DESC_CONTENT, STATE, IS_PUBLISH, FLAG, CREATED_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, CREATED_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_menu
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (MENU_ID, MENU_PARENT_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_LEVELS, MENU_TYPE, MENU_PATH, DESC_CONTENT, STATE, IS_PUBLISH, FLAG, CREATED_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, CREATED_USER) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{menuLevels,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{menuType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{menuPath,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isPublish,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into sys_menu
MENU_ID,
MENU_PARENT_ID,
MENU_NAME,
MENU_LEVELS,
MENU_TYPE,
MENU_PATH,
DESC_CONTENT,
STATE,
IS_PUBLISH,
FLAG,
CREATED_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,
UPDATE_USER,
CREATED_USER,

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
MENU_ID = #{record.menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MENU_PARENT_ID = #{record.menuParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MENU_NAME = #{record.menuName,jdbcType=CHAR},
MENU_LEVELS = #{record.menuLevels,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MENU_TYPE = #{record.menuType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MENU_PATH = #{record.menuPath,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESC_CONTENT = #{record.descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_PUBLISH = #{record.isPublish,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FLAG = #{record.flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sys_menu set MENU_ID = #{record.menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MENU_PARENT_ID = #{record.menuParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MENU_NAME = #{record.menuName,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENU_LEVELS = #{record.menuLevels,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MENU_TYPE = #{record.menuType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MENU_PATH = #{record.menuPath,jdbcType=CHAR}, DESC_CONTENT = #{record.descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IS_PUBLISH = #{record.isPublish,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FLAG = #{record.flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sys_menu
MENU_PARENT_ID = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=CHAR},
MENU_LEVELS = #{menuLevels,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MENU_PATH = #{menuPath,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESC_CONTENT = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_PUBLISH = #{isPublish,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_menu set MENU_PARENT_ID = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENU_LEVELS = #{menuLevels,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MENU_PATH = #{menuPath,jdbcType=CHAR}, DESC_CONTENT = #{descContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, IS_PUBLISH = #{isPublish,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT m.MENU_ID AS id, m.MENU_PARENT_ID AS pId, m.MENU_NAME AS name , m.MENU_TYPE AS isParent FROM sys_menu AS m
WHERE m.STATE=1 and m.MENU_TYPE = 1

select case when (select count(1) from ls.sys_role_menu_rel rm where rm.ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and rm.MENU_ID=m.MENU_ID and rm.state=1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as checked, m.MENU_ID AS id, m.MENU_PARENT_ID AS pId, m.MENU_NAME AS name, m.MENU_LEVELS AS menuLevels, m.MENU_TYPE AS open, m.MENU_PATH AS menuPath, m.DESC_CONTENT AS descContent, m.STATE AS state from sys_menu m where m.STATE=1 and m.MENU_LEVELS > 1 ORDER BY m.FLAG

SELECT m.MENU_ID AS menuId, m.MENU_PARENT_ID AS menuParentId, rm.MENU_NAME AS menuParentName, m.MENU_NAME AS menuName, m.MENU_LEVELS AS menuLevels, m.MENU_TYPE AS menuType, m.MENU_PATH AS menuPath, m.DESC_CONTENT AS descContent, m.STATE AS state FROM sys_menu AS m LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS rm ON m.MENU_PARENT_ID = rm.MENU_ID WHERE m.MENU_LEVELS > 1
and m.MENU_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
or m.DESC_CONTENT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
group by m.MENU_ID ORDER BY m.FLAG
mapper.delete: delete from sys_role_menu_rel where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_role_menu_rel where ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and MENU_ID=#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select group_concat(m.MENU_PATH) from sys_menu AS m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu_rel AS rm ON m.MENU_ID = rm.MENU_ID where m.STATE=1 and rm.state=1 and m.MENU_PATH is not null
and rm.ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(MENU_NAME) from sys_menu where 1=1
and MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT (IF(ISNULL(sm.ROLE_ID),0,1)) AS checked, m.MENU_ID AS id, m.MENU_PARENT_ID AS pId, m.MENU_NAME AS name, m.MENU_LEVELS AS menuLevels, m.MENU_TYPE AS open, m.MENU_PATH AS menuPath, m.DESC_CONTENT AS descContent, m.STATE AS state FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu_rel sm ON sm.MENU_ID=m.MENU_ID AND sm.state=1 AND sm.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} WHERE m.STATE=1 AND m.MENU_LEVELS > 1
AND m.`MENU_ID` IN (SELECT srmr.MENU_ID FROM ls.`sys_role_menu_rel` srmr WHERE srmr.ROLE_ID=#{adminRoleId})
ORDER BY m.FLAG
